tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (PRP$ Its)) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ big) (NN distraction)) (PP (IN from) (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS lives)))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Its/PRP$ dep>[distraction/NN det>a/DT amod>big/JJ nmod:from>[lives/NNS case>from/IN nmod:poss>our/PRP$]] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP They)) (VP (VBP create) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN illusion)) (PP (IN of) (SBAR (RB so) (S (NP (PRP we)) (VP (VBP accept) (NP (PRP$ their) (NNPS Solutions)))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [create/VBP nsubj>They/PRP dobj>[illusion/NN det>the/DT acl>[accept/VBP mark>of/IN advmod>so/RB nsubj>we/PRP dobj>[Solutions/NNPS nmod:poss>their/PRP$]]] punct>./.]
